00038 void RequestHandlerFetchScanblock::run() {
00039   ResponseCallbackFetchScanblock cb(m_comm, m_event_ptr);
00040   uint32_t scannerId;
00041   size_t remaining = m_event_ptr->messageLen - 2;
00042   uint8_t *msgPtr = m_event_ptr->message + 2;
00043 
00044   // Scanner ID
00045   if (!Serialization::decode_int(&msgPtr, &remaining, &scannerId))
00046     goto abort;
00047 
00048   m_range_server->fetch_scanblock(&cb, scannerId);
00049   return;
00050 
00051  abort:
00052   HT_ERROR("Encoding problem with FetchScanblock message");
00053   cb.error(Error::PROTOCOL_ERROR, "Encoding problem with FetchScanblock message");
00054 }
